text: Hey there! Check out the latest preliminary burden estimates for the 2023-2024 U.S. flu season! 🤧📊 According to the CDC, the in-season estimates are updated weekly and compared to end-of-season hospitalization estimates from previous seasons. 🔍But wait, there's more! The preliminary estimates are based on reported flu hospitalizations and will increase as the season progresses. 💥 It's important to note that these estimates are subject to change and may vary from year to year. 🤔So, what can we learn from these estimates? Well, it's clear that the flu season is unpredictable and can have a significant impact on public health. 💪 Therefore, it's crucial to take preventive measures, such as getting vaccinated and practicing good hygiene. 🚫But don't just take my word for it! Stay informed and keep an eye on the CDC's updates to stay ahead of the game. 💻
